Kourtney Kardashian Clothes

VN:F [1.9.22_1171]
please wait...
Rating: 8.7/10 (31 votes cast)

Kourtney Kardashian Clothes are hard to miss. Her style selection in fashion varies from elegant to mommy cute. Singer 22 brings all of these top of the line fashions to you online! These are just some of the exclusive offerings found online that were seen on Kourtney Kardashian.

Kourtney Kardashian Clothes

Ballet Flats in Navy Metallic Foil – Kourtney Kardashian Clothes – designed by Yosi Samra

These cute, casual ballerina flats feature an elasticized opening, making them perfect for everyday wear. Rubber sole.







 

Katherine Blazer with Leather Flap – SINGER22 Exclusive – Kourtney Kardashian Clothes – designed by Sandra Weil

55% Polyester, 45% Wool. Imported. *As seen on Kourtney Kardashian.







 

Blazer in Many Colors – Kourtney Kardashian Clothes – designed by Naven

This popular, over-sized blazer features front pockets, and is a must-have wardrobe staple. Measures approximately 25" from shoulder to hem. 100% Silk, Lining is 100% Polyester. Made in the USA.*As seen on Kourtney Kardashian.







 

Evelyn Blazer – Kourtney Kardashian Clothes – designed by Kate Frances

100% Silk. Made in the USA.







 

Evelyn Blazer – Kourtney Kardashian Clothes – designed by Kate Frances

100% Silk. Made in the USA.







 

Camilla Cut Off Denim Shorts in Wonder – Kourtney Kardashian Clothes – designed by Siwy

Siwy Camilla Cut Off Denim Shorts in Wonder as seen on Kourtney KardashianYour classic true blue washed and faded denim in a classic cut off style, worn and ready for you (plus they have SIWY’s signature rear end flattering embroidered pockets!) The shorts have a 2" wide waistband with a 2" zipper and brass logo button closure. They have a 7 1/2" rise and a 2 1/2" inseam plus the ragged fringe. A summer must-have. In denim.Fabric: 98% cotton, 2% Spandex. Made in the USA.







 

Outdoorsman II Sunglasses – Kourtney Kardashian Clothes – designed by Ray-Ban

These timeless aviators feature a thick brow bar, and are the perfect piece to complete any outfit. Frames measures approximately 5.5" x 2". Imported.







 

Edie Shoe – Kourtney Kardashian Clothes – designed by Penelope and Coco

Suede Dalmatian print ankle bootie with black suede lace up closure.2-inch covered platform with black stitch detailing and black rubber tred. 6’ heel.Handmade in Los Angeles.







 

Button Down Combo Blouse – Kourtney Kardashian Clothes – designed by Mara Hoffman

Wear this solid and geometrically print blouse with a pair of skinny jeans for an effortless look. Button closure and slightly longer shirttail in back. Measures approximately 25" from shoulder to hem. 100% Silk. Combo is 100% Polyester. Imported.







 

Reversible Detour Five Pocket Legging in Champagne Coating/French Chalk – Kourtney Kardashian Clothes – designed by Bleulab

Completely reversible stretch legging jeans featuring faux front pockets and back patch pockets. One side is lightly distressed gray and the reverse is shiny coated metallic gray. 7" rise, 31" inseam, 10" leg opening. SINGER22 model is 5’8" tall and wearing a size 25.







 

Wrap Scarf in many colors – Kourtney Kardashian Clothes – designed by Paula Bianco

Kourtney is wearing Olive. This open-knit infinity scarf features shredded stripes and frayed edges. 2′ wide by 6.5′ long. These statement pieces are one you cannot live without during the chilly season. The Paulo Bianco Wrap Scarf is a favorite amongst the Kardashian sisters. Details include shredded stripes and frayed edges.* 80% acrylic/20% nylon.* Hand wash.* Imported.







 

Wrap Scarf in many colors – Kourtney Kardashian Clothes – designed by Paula Bianco

Kourtney is wearing wine. This open-knit infinity scarf features shredded stripes and frayed edges. 2′ wide by 6.5′ long. These statement pieces are one you cannot live without during the chilly season. The Paulo Bianco Wrap Scarf is a favorite amongst the Kardashian sisters. Details include shredded stripes and frayed edges. * 80% acrylic/20% nylon.* Hand wash.* Imported.







 

Python Print Handkerchief Dress in Black – Kourtney Kardashian Clothes – designed by Robert Rodriguez

Racer-back python print V-neck dress featuring an asymmetrical handkerchief hem, draped ruffle overlay at bodice and self-tie belt at waist. Measures approximately 38" from shoulder to center hem. SINGER22 model is 5’8" tall and wearing a size 0.100% Silk.







 

Fame Sweater – Kourtney Kardashian Clothes – designed by Feel The Piece

Oversized long sleeved sweater with a scoop-neck and slouchy fit in luxe cashmere. Can be worn on or off the shoulder. 100% Cashmere.
